description.lang: The Ecolink Z-Wave Plus Siren provides home users with a simple way to keep a location safe and secure.The Ecolink Z-Wave Plus Siren can also be used to audibly notify the user of any Z-Wave state changes.The device is as simple to use as plugging in a wall outlet.The device can create 4 independent tones for different alerts to the user.These could include but are not limited to: Security Alarm, entry/exit, smoke/Fire, temperature and more.The Z-Wave Plus Siren can also be used as a Z-Wave Plus network extension.
